text: 1. connect This system call sends SYN packets — it does something, so active. 2. bind This system call binds the local machine's IP and port address to the socket — it does something, so active. 3. listen This system call just makes the machine wait for someone to send a SYN packet — clearly passive. 4. accept This system call sends ACK in response to SYN packets — it does something, so active.
